Package net.tnemc.core.account.holdings

Class Wallet

java.lang.Object
net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.Wallet
public class Wallet extends Object
Represents a wallet, which holds funds for something

  • Method Details

    • getHoldings

      public Optional<RegionHoldings> getHoldings(@NotNull @NotNull String region)
      Used to get the holdings based on specific specifications, or returns an empty optional if no holdings for the specifications exists.
      Parameters:
      region - The region to use
      Returns:
      The holdings based on specific specifications, or an empty optional if no holdings for the specifications exists.

    • getHoldings

      public Optional<HoldingsEntry> getHoldings(@NotNull @NotNull String region, @NotNull @NotNull UUID currency)
      Used to get the holdings based on specific specifications, or returns an empty optional if no holdings for the specifications exists.
      Parameters:
      region - The region to use
      currency - The currency to use.
      Returns:
      The holdings based on specific specifications, or an empty optional if no holdings for the specifications exists.

    • getHoldings

      public Optional<HoldingsEntry> getHoldings(@NotNull @NotNull String region, @NotNull @NotNull UUID currency, @NotNull @NotNull Identifier type)
      Used to get the holdings based on specific specifications, or returns an empty optional if no holdings for the specifications exists.
      Parameters:
      region - The region to use
      currency - The currency to use.
      type - The type to use.
      Returns:
      The holdings based on specific specifications, or an empty optional if no holdings for the specifications exists.

    • getHoldings

      public HoldingsEntry getHoldings(@NotNull @NotNull String region, @NotNull @NotNull UUID currency, @NotNull @NotNull Identifier type, @NotNull @NotNull HoldingsEntry defaultValue)
      Used to get the holdings based on specific specifications, or returns the specified default value if no holdings for the specifications exists.
      Parameters:
      region - The region to use
      currency - The currency to use.
      type - The type to use.
      defaultValue - The default value to return if nothing exists.
      Returns:
      The holdings based on specific specifications, or the specified default value if no holdings for the specifications exists.

    • modifyHoldings

      public void modifyHoldings(@NotNull @NotNull HoldingsModifier modifier)
      Used to modify holdings within this wallet. If the wallet has no holdings for the region, currency and type it will set the holdings to the modifier.
      Parameters:
      modifier - The modifier to use

    • modifyHoldings

      public void modifyHoldings(@NotNull @NotNull HoldingsModifier modifier, Identifier type)
      Used to modify holdings within this wallet. If the wallet has no holdings for the region, currency and type it will set the holdings to the modifier.
      Parameters:
      modifier - The modifier to use
      type - The type to use.

    • deleteHoldings

      public void deleteHoldings(@NotNull @NotNull String region)
      Used to delete specific holdings from this wallet holder.
      Parameters:
      region - The region from which to delete the holdings

    • deleteHoldings

      public void deleteHoldings(@NotNull @NotNull String region, @NotNull @NotNull UUID currency)
      Used to delete specific holdings from this wallet holder.
      Parameters:
      region - The region from which to delete the holdings
      currency - The currency from which to delete the holdings

    • deleteHoldings

      public void deleteHoldings(@NotNull @NotNull String region, @NotNull @NotNull UUID currency, @NotNull @NotNull Identifier type)
      Used to delete specific holdings from this wallet holder.
      Parameters:
      region - The region from which to delete the holdings
      currency - The currency from which to delete the holdings
      type - The type from which to delete the holdings.

    • deleteAllHoldings

      public void deleteAllHoldings()

    • merge

      public void merge(@NotNull @NotNull Wallet wallet)
      Used to merge another wallet into this one. After it has been merged, the old wallet will have all of its holdings cleared.
      Parameters:
      wallet - The other wallet to merge.

    • contains

      public boolean contains(@NotNull @NotNull String region, @NotNull @NotNull UUID currency)
      Checks if the specified region contains the given currency in the wallet.
      Parameters:
      region - The region to check.
      currency - The currency to check.
      Returns:
      true if the region contains the currency in the wallet, false otherwise.

    • entryList

      public List<HoldingsEntry> entryList()
      Returns a list of all holdings entries in the wallet.
      Returns:
      a list of HoldingsEntry objects representing the holdings

    • getHoldings

      public Map<String,RegionHoldings> getHoldings()
      Retrieves the holdings map for the wallet.
      Returns:
      A map of region names to RegionHoldings objects representing the holdings for each region.

    • setHoldings

      public void setHoldings(@NotNull @NotNull HoldingsEntry entry)
      Sets the holdings for the specified entry and in this wallet.
      Parameters:
      entry - The entry to set in this wallet.
